Name: Glitch
About the game: This game has been discontinued! My new game, Venge, is the 'glitch', but much much better in every possible way. Go check it out! {LINK REMOVED} You fell didn't you... is this where you wanted to be? You are taking a casual stroll through the forest, you hear the ground break and next thing you know.. you find yourself in a mysterious world. 60 feet underground, you must, over the course of multiple parts, navigate out of the mysterious world and set yourself free!
